pages.text: (Collected Essences)I will summarize my observations on discovered essences here. $(br)This may help me with my research, maybe it won't. $(br2)Maybe luck will do.

Aether is the element of galaxies, the unknown and the space of possibilities, sometimes even time-space and existence in general. $(br)Its vague direct definition sometimes lets people consider it the 'other' element.
Air is the element of all gas, motion and sometimes even the element of senses. $(br)It is also well known to react with the fire essence, so I should give that a try.

Earth is the element of solid matter. $(br)It is often connected with life, though it is also generally known that more than one primal aspect is needed for something of such complexity. $(br)Generally, I should consider using it when trying to create essences that are connected to organisms.

Fire is the element of power, puissance and of course fire. $(br)It should be noted that it is not necessarily every kind of energy, however, thermal energy can definitely be counted to it. $(br)Fire is sometimes also used to represent consciousness.$(br)Generally, every essence that has some process connected with energy to it uses it.
Water is the element of liquids, a crucial component to life as we know it and is sometimes even connected to feelings. $(br)Generally, it is often known to be one of the simplest primal elements.

pages.name: Crystal Essence
pages.text: The aspect of crystals symbolizes the structure in all crystalline matter and is thus loosely connected to the aspect of Order. $(br)One may describe it as the 'stronger earth aspect'.

pages.name: Crystal Essence
pages.text: Order: the very force, or rather, not-force that keeps the universe from collapsing in chaos.

pages.name: Life Essence
pages.text: The aspect of life... is quite lively. It is able to adapt to cruel conditions and is the aspect that persists chaos, or rather, order the most... till death.

pages.name: Electricity Essence
pages.text: This truly shocking aspect describes the energy of electricity, with its motion and its influence.

pages.name: Light Essence
pages.text: Being sustained by the air and its motion, fire creates light. Light so glorious even gods might see it.

pages.name: Ice Essence
pages.text: The hard water, basically, but also coldness.

pages.name: Ice Essence
pages.text: The body, my body, our body, all bodies. Maybe a father.

pages.name: Soul Essence
pages.text: The mind knows and the mind perceives, yet it may be a son.

pages.name: Soul Essence
pages.text: The soul and the spirit, and what lies beneath it.

Chaos essence is the chaotic aspect of aether, and is the destructive force keeping the universe from becoming the most ordered. It is like the fire that warms and consumes, although order is always the ash.
